item.title: UE4渲染过程
item.author: 1427298682@qq.com (redisread)
item.description: 渲染相关类 如何在C ++中从UTexture2D读取数据 https://forums.unrealengine.com/development-discussion/c-gameplay-programming/1422920-casting-converting-frhitexture-to-utexture Unreal渲染相关的缓冲区 Texture2D UTexture2D 复合纹理,可以根据法线贴图变化(主要是来自 mip 贴图)来
